body_html: @soumith in my case, it just updates pytorch to version 0.1.7, torchvision still at the version 0.1.6. I have tried various ways such as conda install --force -c soumith torchvision or conda install -c soumith torchvision=0.1.7 but conda just throwed various errors.
body_text: @soumith  in my case, it just updates pytorch to version 0.1.7, torchvision still at the version 0.1.6. I have tried various ways such as conda install --force -c soumith torchvision or conda install -c soumith torchvision=0.1.7 but conda just throwed various errors.
body: @soumith  in my case, it just updates pytorch to version 0.1.7, torchvision still at the version 0.1.6. I have tried various ways such as `conda install --force -c soumith torchvision` or `conda install -c soumith torchvision=0.1.7` but conda just throwed various errors.
